error_codes.error_message: the input parameter “sign” that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied
The request signature does not conform to lazop standards

error_codes.solution: Possible causes, incorrect authorisation url; authorisation code more than half an hour old

1、please check if your Code is from the callback URL;2、Please check if your Code has already been used, each Code can only be used once;3、Code is valid for 30 minutes, it will expire after 30 minutes;4、Please check whether you are using the endpoints required by the API documentation;5、Please check whether the client id and the appkey of the request are the same when authorizing.

request_example.ruby:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/auth/token/create')
request.add_api_parameter("code", "0_100132_2DL4DV3jcU1UOT7WGI1A4rY91")
request.add_api_parameter("uuid", "This field is currently invalid,  do not use this field please")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Returns the products with the status matching this parameter. Possible values are all, live, inactive, deleted, pending, rejected, sold-out. Mandatory.

parameters.name: update_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned product list to those updated before or on a specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: create_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those created before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Deprecated(The number of Items you want to skip before you start counting),It is recommended to use date for scrolling query.The maximum offset is 10000

parameters.name: create_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those created after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: update_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of Items you would like to fetch from every response,The maximum is 50.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: This value can be used to get more stock information. e.g., Options=1 means contain ReservedStock, RtsStock, PendingStock, RealTimeStock, FulfillmentBySellable.

parameters.name: sku_seller_list
parameters.description: Only products that have the Seller SKU in this list will be returned. Input should be a JSON array. For example, ["Apple 6S Gold", "Apple 6S Black"]. It only matches the whole words. A maximum of 100 SKUs can be returned.

parameters.name: period_end_time
parameters.description: when specific period required, the period end time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)

parameters.name: region_type
parameters.description: ALL_REGIONS | SPECIAL_REGIONS, when regions query api return empty just support ALL_REGIONS

parameters.name: period_start_time
parameters.description: when specific period required, the period start time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)

parameters.name: campaign_tag
parameters.description: when CAMPAIGN template type and CAMPAIGN_PRODUCTS apply type required

parameters.name: region_value
parameters.description: when SPECIAL_REGIONS required, data from regions query api

parameters.name: delivery_option
parameters.description: data from delivery options query list api

parameters.name: deal_criteria
parameters.description: the criteria that customer can enjoy shipping fee subsidy, MONEY_VALUE_FROM_X|ITEM_QUANTITY_FROM_X|NO_CONDITION

%2Forders%2Fget.description: Use this API to get the list of items for a range of orders1..

common_parameters.name: app_key
common_parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: API interface call credentials

common_parameters.name: sign_method
common_parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: here (https://open.lazada.com/apps/doc/doc?nodeId=10450&docId=108068)

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Allows to choose the sorting column. Possible values are created_at and updated_at.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Either UpdatedAfter or CreatedAfter is mandatory.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: When set, limits the returned set of orders to loose orders, which return only entries which fit the status provided. Possible values are unpaid, pending, canceled, ready_to_ship, delivered, returned, shipped , failed, topack,toship,shipping and lost

parameters.name: update_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specify the sorting type. Possible values are ASC and DESC.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of orders to skip at the beginning of the list.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of orders that can be returned. The supported maximum number is 100.

parameters.name: update_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Either UpdatedAfter or CreatedAfter is mandatory.

error_codes.solution: The value for the offset parameter is not valid.
The date format is not valid.
The value for the limit parameter is not valid.
The specified status filter is not valid.
The specified sort direction is not valid.
The specified sort filter is not valid.

error_codes.error_message: Seller not verified,please check seller status
error_codes.solution: The seller's store opening process has not been completed, please log in to the Seller Center, check the store information that needs to be improved on the home page and submit it for review.

error_codes.error_message: Seller not verified,please check seller status
error_codes.solution: The seller's store opening process has not been completed, please log in to the Seller Center, check the store information that needs to be improved on the home page and submit it for review.

The status field value is incorrect and only these enumerations are currently supported:unpaid, pending, packed, canceled, ready_to_ship, delivered, returned, shipped , failed, topack,toship , lost, lost_by_3pl, damaged_by_3pl, failed_delivery, shipped_back, shipped_back_success, shipped_back_failed, package_scrapped.
The time format used in the request is incorrect, please make sure your time format meets this format requirement: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss±HH:MM.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
1. planned: when stop is dispatched to courier
 2. arrived: when driver arrived at stop and start pickup
 3. finished: when driver finished pickup at the stop
 4. skipped: when driver selected to skip the stop due to some reason
 5. removed: when the stop has 0 RTS

parameters.name: statusUpdateTime
parameters.description: actual process time when reaching the status

parameters.name: eta
parameters.description: when the ETA is updated, need to update the data to Lazada side, scenario include: 1. without ETA >> with ETA 2. with ETA >> without ETA 3. ETA change from A to B

client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)

request.add_api_parameter("dispatcherContact", "+841231231123")
request.add_api_parameter("driverId", "DriverX")
request.add_api_parameter("driverName", "John Wick")
request.add_api_parameter("driverContact", "+841231231124")
request.add_api_parameter("eta", "1659439136265")

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: modifier
parameters.description: Modifier name. if blank will use 3PL name

parameters.name: subTypes
parameters.description: Y Station subtypes (depends on function) enum: DOP function: MDOP, DOP, OTC,IDOP CP function: COLLECTION_ON_POINT, MOBILE_COLLECTION_POINT, LOCKER Return function: CUSTOMER_RETURN

parameters.name: age
parameters.description: Number of days the station can keep packages for (used by LOP station tool). If not withdrawn by the customer within the age value, the package will be picked up from the station by a dedicated 3PL and brought to the warehouse. The package will be marked as failed delivery. Unit: Days

parameters.name: firstMileTplSlugs
parameters.description: Which 3PL can go and pick up the seller dropped-off parcel from the station

parameters.name: lastMileTplSlugs
parameters.description: This is a list of logistics providers which can deliver packages to this station.

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Timezone (used to calculate the schedules) If not specified, use default country timezone format: (+/-)XX:XX

client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)

request.add_api_parameter("lastMileTplSlugs", "[\"ninjavan-id\",\"jne\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("contact", "{\"phone\":\"+84000000000\",\"name\":\"Zohan\",\"email\":\"email@gmail.com\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("address", "{\"latitude\":\"10.131231\",\"details\":\"08-18, 233 SERANGOON AVENUE 3Singapore, Singapore\",\"id\":\"R80071346\",\"longitude\":\"113.131231\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("timeZone", "+08:00")
request.add_api_parameter("schedules", "[{\"workDays\":[\"MONDAY\",\"MONDAY\"],\"startTime\":\"08:00:00\",\"endTime\":\"18:00:00\",\"cutOffTime\":\"17:00:00\"}]")

parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: modifier
parameters.description: Modifier name. if blank will use 3PL name

parameters.name: subTypes
parameters.description: Y Station subtypes (depends on function) enum: DOP function: MDOP, DOP, OTC,IDOP CP function: COLLECTION_ON_POINT, MOBILE_COLLECTION_POINT, LOCKER Return function: CUSTOMER_RETURN

parameters.name: age
parameters.description: Number of days the station can keep packages for (used by LOP station tool). If not withdrawn by the customer within the age value, the package will be picked up from the station by a dedicated 3PL and brought to the warehouse. The package will be marked as failed delivery. Unit: Days

parameters.name: firstMileTplSlugs
parameters.description: Which 3PL can go and pick up the seller dropped-off parcel from the station

parameters.name: lastMileTplSlugs
parameters.description: This is a list of logistics providers which can deliver packages to this station.

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Timezone (used to calculate the schedules) If not specified, use default country timezone format: (+/-)XX:XX

%2Fpartner%2Ftransaction.description: Using this interface, you can obtain the seller's transaction order based on the conditions, and also contain the membership information

common_parameters.name: app_key
common_parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: API interface call credentials

common_parameters.name: sign_method
common_parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: here (https://open.lazada.com/apps/doc/doc?nodeId=10450&docId=108068)

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: When set, limits the returned set of orders to loose orders, which return only entries which fit the status provided. Possible values are unpaid, pending, canceled, ready_to_ship, delivered, returned, shipped , failed, topack,toship,shipping and lost

parameters.name: update_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specify the sorting type. Possible values are ASC and DESC.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of orders to skip at the beginning of the list.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of orders that can be returned. The supported maximum number is 100.

parameters.name: update_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Either UpdatedAfter or CreatedAfter is mandatory.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Allows to choose the sorting column. Possible values are created_at and updated_at.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned orders to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Either UpdatedAfter or CreatedAfter is mandatory.

request_example.ruby:

%2Fpartner%2Funlink.description: Used to remove a linked membership from Lazada. Please note that the link will not physically be removed, but deactivated.

common_parameters.name: app_key
common_parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: API interface call credentials

common_parameters.name: sign_method
common_parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

common_parameters.name: sign

common_parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common_parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common_parameters.description: API interface call credentials

common_parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

common_parameters.description: here (https://open.lazada.com/apps/doc/doc?nodeId=10450&docId=108068)

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: tier
parameters.description: Customer’s tier in partner side, shown as-is

parameters.name: tier_expiry
parameters.description: Expiry of the membership, shown as-is

parameters.name: p_uid
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the member on partner side, used to establish the link to partner ID.

parameters.name: member_name
parameters.description: Name of member on partner side, to easier identify the membership on My Account pages

parameters.name: valid_from
parameters.description: Valid from of this balance in RFC RFC3339 format. Ignore if this is no validity period for the balance

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: One of: ‘active’ – For activated members ‘inactive’ – For inactive member ‘pending’ – For members that are pending activation

parameters.name: valid_to
parameters.description: Valid to of this balance in RFC RFC3339 format. Ignore if this is no validity period for the balance

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Placements determine where shoppers will see your promoted products.3:Search Result Page;4:Just For You Page

parameters.name: autoCreative
parameters.description: Lazada automatically set creatives for your products.1:ON;0:OFF.

parameters.name: campaignObjective
parameters.description: Your campaign objective helps determine your bidding strategy - Traffic objective helps you to increase the number of clicks to your store, while sales objective helps to increase your store’s sales.1:Traffic;2:Sales.

parameters.name: campaignType
parameters.description: Unlock different ways to bids, select products, and keywords with campaign types.1:Standard;2:Smart.

parameters.name: maxBid
parameters.description: Max bid determines the highest amount that you're willing to pay for a click on your promoted product.String type, -1 means no limit.

parameters.name: autoItemSelect
parameters.description: The way the product be selected.1:manual(I want to select products manually from my store.);2:auto(Let Lazada optimize the products within the campaigns in real-time to maximize the campaigns' performance)

parameters.name: dayBudget
parameters.description: Budget indicates the maximum amount you’re willing to pay each day.

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

parameters.name: sign_method
parameters.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Returns the products with the status matching this parameter. Possible values are all, live, inactive, deleted, pending, rejected, sold-out. Mandatory.

parameters.name: update_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned product list to those updated before or on a specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: create_before
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those created before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Deprecated(The number of Items you want to skip before you start counting),It is recommended to use date for scrolling query.The maximum offset is 10000

parameters.name: create_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those created after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: update_after
parameters.description: Limits the returned products to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of Items you would like to fetch from every response,The maximum is 50.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: This value can be used to get more stock information. e.g., Options=1 means contain ReservedStock, RtsStock, PendingStock, RealTimeStock, FulfillmentBySellable.

parameters.name: sku_seller_list
parameters.description: Only products that have the Seller SKU in this list will be returned. Input should be a JSON array. For example, ["Apple 6S Gold", "Apple 6S Black"]. It only matches the whole words. A maximum of 100 SKUs can be returned.

parameters.name: site
parameters.description: The country site of the queried Product
